author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter LED shower niche switch tips…I ran the LIPROTEC low voltage wire through the top of the box and the 14/2 Romex through the bottom. That way I can separate them inside the box with the voltage divider, which is important. The ECX is both a dimmable switch and driver that controls the waterproof LED inside the niche. Many thanks to @schlutersystems1  for sponsoring this tutorial 🔥
title: Schluter LED Shower Niche Switch Tips - #shorts #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
